ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:57:27 [Issue ID 4000-46756] urn:comicvine:4000-46756 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:52:05. [Issue ID 63734]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The are DV8! Bliss, Copycat, Evo, Frostbite, Powerhaus, Sublime and Threshold - writer Warren Ellis created this hardcore super teen team of anti-heroes as a counterpoint to the lighthearted young super hero teams so prevalent in comics!
During a mission Russia, Evo is seriously damaged. Frostbite and Sublimate decide to stay to help him, while the rest of the team goes away.
Having to find Evo, they find a ancient Russian base where experiments were made on children to develop their power. The Russian army arrives at this moment to erase any tracks of the experiments and kill the children. These succeed in destroying) the Russian army and go to Moscow to take revenge.
The rest of DV8 succeeds once again in immobilizing Threshold and comes to help Evo, Frostbite and Sublimates.
ComicInfo.Title: Three
ComicInfo.Penciller: Michael Lopez,J. J. Kirby,Michael Lopez,J. J. Kirby
